question: Will Hikaru Nakamura Qualify for the FIDE 2022 Candidates Tournament?
description:
The FIDE Grand Prix 2022 is a series of three chess tournaments and the final qualifier for the Candidates Tournament, played between February 3 and April 4 2022 in Berlin, Germany and Belgrade, Serbia. The top two finishers will qualify for the Candidates Tournament 2022, which is the final qualification stage for the World Chess Championship 2023. 

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Hikaru Nakamura qualifies for the Candidates Tournament 2022, and to "No" otherwise.

If for any reason the qualified players are not decided by April 11 (11:59:59 PM ET), this market will resolve to "No".

question: Will the price of $MATIC be above $1.40 on March 25, 2022?
description:
This is a market on if the price of $MATIC will be above $1.40 in USD on March 25, 2022.

This market will resolve to “Yes” if Polygon ($MATIC) has a candlestick closing price of $1.41 or more, as per the resolution source, on March 25, 2022, 12pm ET, and “No” otherwise.

The resolution source for this market will be prices listed on CoinGecko (https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/polygon).

This market will resolve according to the “C” (i.e. closing price) listed for the candle titled “Fri 25 March 2022, 12:00:00”, with the “Price” tab selected, in the Eastern Time Zone. Note, this 12:00:00 candle lists the opening price for 11:30:00 AM ET and the closing price for 12:00:00 PM ET.

The check will be at 12:30 PM ET, March 25, 2022.

question: Will the Fed set interest rates above 1% after their scheduled June meeting?
description:
The FED interest rates are defined in this market by the upper bound of the target federal funds range. The decisions on the target federal fund range are made by the Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) meetings. The resolution source for this market is the FOMC’s statement after the meeting scheduled for June 14-15 according to the official calendar: https://www.federalreserve.gov/monetarypolicy/fomccalendars.htm.

This market will resolve to “Yes”, if the upper bound of the target federal funds rate will be set above 1.00% following the Federal Reserve's June 2022 meeting, otherwise - it will resolve to “No.”

The level and change of the target federal funds rate is also being published at the official website of the Federal Reserve at https://www.federalreserve.gov/monetarypolicy/openmarket.htm

This market resolves as soon as the FOMC’s statement for their June meeting with relevant data is issued.

If after the conclusion of the scheduled meeting no statement is released by June 22, 2022, 11:59:59 PM ET then this market will resolve 50-50.
groupItemTitle: Above 1% after June meeting? (25 bips or more)

events.title: Fed Interest Rates June 2022
events.description: Market group

question: Will China report a record high 7-day COVID-19 case average by May 1?
description:
This is a market on whether China will report a record high 7-day COVID-19 case average by May 1, 2022. 

This market will resolve to “Yes” if China reports a record high 7-day COVID-19 case average on or after this market’s inception date of March 15, and on or before May 1, 2022. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No.” 

At the time of this market’s inception, the record high 7-day COVID-19 case average in China was 4602.43. Thus, if China reaches a 7-day COVID-19 case average greater than 4602.43 after March 15 and on or before May 1, 2022, this market would resolve to “Yes.”, regardless of any retroactive updates on the previous record.

This market will resolve on data aggregated by Our World in Data, specifically, the 7-day rolling average of COVID-19 cases for China, with Metric "Confirmed Cases", Interval "7-day rolling average", which is available at https://ourworldindata.org/explorers/coronavirus-data-explorer?facet=none&Interval=7-day+rolling+average&Relative+to+Population=false&Color+by+test+positivity=false&country=~CHN&Metric=Confirmed+cases.

The resolution source will be reviewed daily at 12 PM ET to see if any day had a 7-day rolling average above 4602.43. The final check will be on May 5, 2022.

question: Will Ukraine become a European Union candidate country by July 31st?
description:
An EU candidate country is a country applying to become a member state of the European Union.
Candidate country status is conferred by the European Council on the basis of an opinion from the European Commission, drawn up following an application for membership of the European Union (EU) by the country concerned. However, special procedures might be used.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if, by the resolution time of July 31, 2022 (11:59:59 PM ET), Ukraine is recognized as an EU candidate country. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

This market will be resolved based on official information from the European Council and the European Parliament, primarily their press releases (https://europa.eu/newsroom/ & https://www.consilium.europa.eu/en/press/) and the list of candidate countries (https://ec.europa.eu/environment/enlarg/candidates.htm). 

Note: this market resolves to “Yes” exclusively if Ukraine becomes an EU candidate country (not the potential candidate country, nor any other status), and is not affected by any other stage of the accession process into the EU.

In case another new country becomes an EU candidate country under any name containing the word “Ukraine”, it must cover at least 40% of Ukraine's territory as currently recognized by the United Nations (including Crimea, Donetsk Oblast and Lugansk Oblast) for this market to resolve to “Yes”.

question: Who will win the $1M bet on LUNA's price being over $92.40: Do Kwon or Sensei Algod?
description:
On March 14, 2022, Do Kwon (@stablekwon) and Sensei Algod (@AlgodTrading) made a bet on whether the price of Terra (LUNA) would be lower on March 14, 2023 than it was on March 14, 2022. 

Each party put up 1 million, to an escrow wallet owned by @cobie. Do Kwon bet LUNA would be $92.40 or higher on March 14, 2023, and Sensei Algod bet LUNA would be lower than $92.40.

This market will resolve to “Do Kwon” if Do Kwon wins the bet, or “Sensei Algod” if Sensei Algod wins the bet.

If for whatever reason the winner of the bet isn’t decided by April 1, 2023, or is ambiguous (e.g. the result isn't agreed to by both parties and @cobie), LUNA’s 24h average price on March 14, 2023, ET will be checked. If it is 92.40$ or above, the market will resolve to “Do Kwon”, otherwise it will resolve to “Sensei Algod”.

The 24h price will be calculated from Coingecko (https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/terra-luna), by averaging the close price of all forty-eight 30 minute candles for the timeframe March 14 12:00:00 AM ET to March 15 12:00:00 AM ET. If Coingecko’s relevant candles are unavailable, another credible source will be used.

question: Will the price of wheat close above $1200 on March 25, 2022?
description:
This is a market on whether the price of a "wheat unit" will be above $1200.00 on market close on March 25, 2022. 

If the price of a "wheat unit" is above $1200.00 on market close on this market's resolution date, March 25, 2022, this market will resolve to “Yes”. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

The resolution source for this market will be Yahoo Finance’s reporting of the values offered by the Chicago SRW Wheat Futures, found at (https://finance.yahoo.com/quote/ZW%3DF/history). Resolution will be based on the value listed in column labelled “Close*” under the resolution date. If the resolution source is unavailable on market close on March 25, 2022, another credible source (such as https://www.cmegroup.com/markets/agriculture/grains/wheat.html) will be used.

question: Will Coinbase’s NFT marketplace be live by May 1st, 2022?
description:
This is a market on whether Coinbase’s NFT platform launches to the public prior to May 1st, 2022, 11:59 PM ET. 

This market will resolve to “Yes” if the platform is launched prior to the resolution date, and “No” otherwise. 

“Launch” for the purposes of this market requires that the general public in the United States (the majority of Americans) is able to do one of the following: mint, buy, sell, list, or bid on NFTs from within the Coinbase NFT platform. A closed or private beta will not count, though a public beta will. 

If such a platform is temporarily inaccessible due to maintenance, system overload, or DDOS attack, resolution of this market will be delayed up to 72 hours.

The primary resolution source for this marketplace will be information from an opened Coinbase NFT marketplace, however information officially provided by Coinbase (https://www.coinbase.com/) and other credible media will be used.

events.title: Will Coinbase’s NFT marketplace be live by...?
events.description: This is a market group on the when Coinbase’s NFT marketplace will launch by.

question: NCAA: Will the Gonzaga Bulldogs win March Madness 2022?
description:
The NCAA Division I Men's Basketball Tournament, also known and branded as NCAA March Madness, is a single-elimination tournament played each spring in the United States, currently featuring 68 college basketball teams from the Division I level of the National Collegiate Athletic Association (NCAA), to determine the national championship. 

This market asks whether Gonzaga Bulldogs will win the championship round of the NCAA March Madness Tournament in 2022.

If the Gonzaga Bulldogs win the championship round of the NCAA March Madness Tournament in 2022, scheduled to take place on April 4, 2022, this market will resolve to “Yes”. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from NCAA (https://www.ncaa.com/march-madness-live/bracket), however credible reporting will also suffice.

events.title: NCAA: Will the Gonzaga Bulldogs win March Madness 2022?
